## DOCUMENT 1: CORE BANKING SYSTEM OVERVIEW

SOURCE_URL: https://musonisystem.com/core-banking-system/
RETRIEVED: 2025-12-03
CATEGORY: Product Intelligence
CERTAINTY: High

### CONTENT:

Musoni System is a cloud-based core banking system specifically designed for microfinance institutions. The platform provides comprehensive functionality for managing clients, groups, loans, savings, and accounting operations.

**Core Modules:**
- Individual & Group Client methodologies fully supported
- Full & flexible loan and savings modules
- Launch products quickly & easily
- Realtime bookings & financial reports at fingertips
- Extensive high quality reports alongside report scheduler and data export tool
- Automated credit committees with unique system checks
- PPI & custom surveys included as standard
- Automated SMS & integration with mobile money services
- Improves efficiency and digitalizes field operations

**Key Features:**
- Cloud-based (no hardware investment required)
- 99.97% guaranteed uptime
- Accessible via reliable internet connection and modern web browser
- Flexible and affordable pricing structure
- Used by over 70 organisations in 30 different countries
- Supports MFIs, NGOs, SACCOs, rural banks and asset finance companies

## DOCUMENT 2: DIGITAL FIELD APPLICATION (DFA)

SOURCE_URL: https://musonisystem.com/digital-field-application/
RETRIEVED: 2025-12-03
CATEGORY: Product Intelligence
CERTAINTY: High

### CONTENT:

The Musoni Digital Field Application improves efficiency for financial organisations by digitalising all data capture in the field.

**Core Functionality on Tablet Application:**
- Viewing core client information
- Registering new clients in online & offline mode
- Viewing core group information
- Creating new groups
- Adding & removing clients to groups
- Creating new loans for clients
- Making individual repayments & deposits
- Making payments for all group members simultaneously
- Creating unlimited surveys to collect data in the field

**Offline-First Architecture:**
The DFA is capable of operating in both online and offline modes, making it perfect for use in rural areas with limited mobile data connectivity. Field officers can continue to work even in areas with limited internet connectivity, and the data will be synced to the core banking system once internet connectivity is restored.

**Platform Availability:**
Available on all Android devices, including tablets and mobile phones. This means that field/loan officers can now easily access the application while on the go, making loan disbursement and collection more convenient and efficient.

**Impact Results:**
- Using the Musoni Digital Field Application increased the case load per loan officer by 68%
- Reduced turnaround time from 72 hours to 6 hours
- MFI realized cost savings of $27,246 in the first year of launching
- Positive ROI in under 12 months

SOURCE_URL: https://developer.musoniservices.com/demo/

CATEGORY: Product Intelligence
CERTAINTY: High

### CONTENT:

Musoni is working towards documenting their APIs using the OpenAPI 3+ specification. This documentation is in BETA and subject to change.

**API Access:**

- Can be requested via the Musoni Service Desk
- Complete API documentation available showing detailed API calls for any action
- Example responses provided for all system functionality

**Integration Capabilities:**
Musoni has been designed to allow fast and straightforward external integrations using modern web technologies such as REST APIs and Webhooks.

**Legacy Documentation:**
Older API documentation remains available from Legacy API Documentation for areas not covered in the OpenAPI documentation.

## DOCUMENT 5: MOBILE MONEY INTEGRATION

SOURCE_URL: https://mifos.org/directory-listing/musoni-services/
RETRIEVED: 2025-12-03
CATEGORY: Product Intelligence
CERTAINTY: High

### CONTENT:

On top of the MifosX platform, Musoni has added integrations with the world's leading mobile-money channels:
- M-PESA (Kenya)
- Airtel Money
- Payway

**Capabilities:**
- Enables MFIs to send and receive payments
- Automated transaction processing
- Over 3 million MMT (Mobile Money Transfer) transactions processed
- Integration with Safaricom's M-PESA platform for loan disbursements and repayment collections

**Unique Middleware:**
Musoni built its own middleware as an improvement upon the M-PESA software to:
- Facilitate the money transfer process
- Authenticate loan repayments
- Process transactions automatically

**Customer Example:**
Musoni Microfinance Kenya received in last 6 months alone:
- 5,000+ balance enquiries
- 40,000+ loan repayments
- 100,000+ loan applications
All fully automatically via mobile money integration.

## DOCUMENT 6: SMS MODULE

SOURCE_URL: http://musonisystem.com/2014/06/musoni-system-sms-module-launched/
RETRIEVED: 2025-12-03
CATEGORY: Product Intelligence
CERTAINTY: High

### CONTENT:

In 2011, Musoni launched an SMS module enabling automatic and personalised payment reminders to be sent directly to clients.

**Use Cases:**
- Missed instalment reminders
- Congratulatory messages on completing a loan
- Marketing campaigns
- General client communication

**Campaign Setup:**
Users can configure:
- Campaign Name
- Type (one-off or recurring)
- Date for message delivery
- Frequency of recurring campaigns (daily, weekly, etc.)
- Business rule (e.g., all clients who received loan in last 7 days)
- Parameters linked to business rule

**Impact:**
- Over 800,000 SMS messages processed since launch
- Still processes over 500 messages a day
- 2012 study concluded SMS campaigns were significant factor in Musoni Kenya's excellent portfolio quality
- First to extensively use SMS messages as payment reminders in microfinance

## DOCUMENT 7: PPI (POVERTY PROBABILITY INDEX) INTEGRATION

SOURCE_URL: https://musonisystem.com/ppi-integrated-standard-musoni-system/
RETRIEVED: 2025-12-03
CATEGORY: Product Intelligence
CERTAINTY: High

### CONTENT:

PPI surveys are included as standard in the Musoni System.

**How It Works:**
- Users select the PPI for their country
- Select the poverty line they wish to track against
- Add PPI data for each client
- System automatically calculates likelihood the client is below selected poverty line
- PPI reports make it easy to monitor social performance across the institution

**Benefits:**
- Measure social performance
- Monitor client growth over time
- Analyze average poverty level of clients
- Validate strategic course of action
- Tailor future product offerings

**Musoni Kenya Example:**
"The data collected so far gives us a snapshot of our client base. We can see who is most prone to poverty based on age, gender, and other factors." - Stanley Munyao, acting CEO

Musoni Kenya was highlighted in Grameen's 2014 PPI Global Use Report as one of 200 organisations around the world actively using PPI surveys to monitor social impact.

---

## DOCUMENT 8: CREDIT SCORING INTEGRATION

SOURCE_URL: https://musonisystem.com/musonis-integration-with-credit-scoring-systems-transforming-lending-operations/
RETRIEVED: 2025-12-03
CATEGORY: Product Intelligence
CERTAINTY: High

### CONTENT:

Musoni's credit scoring integration is transforming lending operations by eliminating manual processes and improving loan application efficiency.

**Integration Process:**
1. Application monitoring - continuously checks for new loan applications
2. Data preparation - converts application data into required format for credit scoring services
3. API management - secure API interactions between Musoni and third-party scoring services
4. Score processing - returned credit scores organized into actionable insights

**Key Partners:**

**LendXS:**
- Developed score card specifically for Musoni
- Helps MFIs better assess risk of lending to smallholder farmers
- Scores automatically pushed back into Musoni using APIs
- Used as part of organization's normal loan appraisal process

**MCIX (Myanmar Credit Info Exchange):**
- Musoni is first core banking system fully integrated into MCIX
- Automated process using MCIX API layer
- Organizations can build custom credit checks
- Automatically reject loans or give warnings based on MCIX data
- Reduces work for operations teams
- Enables further automation of loan appraisal process

**Brankas (Asia):**
- Partnership to enhance credit scoring in Asia
- Corporate financing focus

**Benefits:**
- Increased productivity - loan officers focus only on viable clients
- Improved compliance - automated processes ensure regulatory requirements followed consistently
- Reduces loan processing times from days to minutes
- Immediate eligibility assessment at point of client interaction

## DOCUMENT 12: CLIENT FACING APPLICATION (CFA)

SOURCE_URL: https://www.softwareadvice.com/loan-origination/musoni-profile/reviews/
RETRIEVED: 2025-12-03
CATEGORY: Product Intelligence
CERTAINTY: Medium

### CONTENT:

The Client Facing Application (CFA) is deliberately meant as an entry level application and designed to be taken over by organizations using Musoni who can then add their own specific functionality.

**Features:**
- Client app makes it easier for clients to access loan details
- Access savings details
- Apply for loans in real-time
- Integration via open APIs

**Implementation Examples:**
- Zibuko Capital built their own Zibuko Mobile app on Musoni's CFA
- Hayman Microfinance launched client mobile banking app on Musoni APIs
- Organizations integrate CFA and Chatbot options to core banking system

**Customer Feedback - Limitations:**
"The minimal features on the CFA is a serious downside to the extension of digital services to the unbanked."

"Failure to offer loan origination on their mobile app like uploading documents, etc."

**Strategic Note:**
Musoni deliberately keeps CFA minimal, expecting organizations to build their own customized client apps using Musoni's APIs. This is both a strength (flexibility) and weakness (requires development resources from customers).
